name: Rainslasher
description: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

passiveDescription.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>20%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.1: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>24%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.2: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>28%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.3: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>32%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.4: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>36%</cryo>.
